# EulerAnglesFloat | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ Spatial ](/documentation/spatial)

-  EulerAnglesFloat 

Structure# EulerAnglesFloat

iOS 26.0+iPadOS 26.0+Mac Catalyst 26.0+macOS 26.0+tvOS 26.0+visionOS 26.0+watchOS 26.0+

```
struct EulerAnglesFloat
```

## [Overview](/documentation/spatial/euleranglesfloat#overview)

A structure that represents Euler angles, in radians, and ordering.

## [Topics](/documentation/spatial/euleranglesfloat#topics)

### [Initializers](/documentation/spatial/euleranglesfloat#Initializers)

[`init()`](/documentation/spatial/euleranglesfloat/init())[`init(angles: simd_float3, order: __SPEulerAngleOrder)`](/documentation/spatial/euleranglesfloat/init(angles:order:))[`init(x: Angle2DFloat, y: Angle2DFloat, z: Angle2DFloat, order: EulerAngles.Order)`](/documentation/spatial/euleranglesfloat/init(x:y:z:order:))Returns a new Euler angles structure from three angle structures.### [Instance Properties](/documentation/spatial/euleranglesfloat#Instance-Properties)

[`var angles: simd_float3`](/documentation/spatial/euleranglesfloat/angles)A three-element vector that contains the angles, in radians.[`var order: __SPEulerAngleOrder`](/documentation/spatial/euleranglesfloat/order)A constant that specify the Euler angle order.## [Relationships](/documentation/spatial/euleranglesfloat#relationships)
